revision.comment: ([[c:GR|GR]]) [[c:COM:FR|File renamed]]: [[File:Yeppity US.ogg]] → [[File:En-us-yeppity.oga]] Standard filename format for pronunciation files
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|yep|ity}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{a|US}} {{IPA|en|[ˈjɛpɨɾi]}} * {{audio|en|En-us-yeppity.oga|Audio (U.S.A.)}} ===Adverb=== {{en-adv|-}} # {{lb|en|colloquial}} [[yes|Yes]]. #* '''2003''', Cathy Hopkins, ''Mates, Dates, and Sequin Smiles'', Simon Pulse (2004), {{ISBN|0689867239}}, [http://books.google.com/books?id=l-R25ASKdZkC&pg=PA160&dq=%22yeppity%22#v=onepage&q=%22yeppity%22&f=false page 160]: #*: Bingo, I thought. Hoho haha, yep '''yeppity''' yes. #* '''2007''', Mark Lane, "Another tax plan, more FAQ", ''The Daytona Beach News-Journal'', 2 November 2007: #*: '''Yeppity''', sir. You're exactly the kind of lucky guy who does OK by this plan. #* '''2011''', Caprice Crane, ''With a Little Luck'', Bantam Books (2011), {{ISBN|9780553386240}}, [http://books.google.com/books?id=iHvY6AQ29GwC&pg=PA272&dq=%22yeppity%22 page 272]: #*: “But it says five—whoa. You mean five hundred thousand?“ #*: “'''Yeppity'''." ====Synonyms==== * See also [[Thesaurus:yes]].
